List of all members | Public Member Functions
draw::ProgressAttr Class Reference

Documentation

This class defines the attributes of any progress object. This class is available as a minimal way to store progress without having to inherit Drawing by using ProgressObject.

Public Member Functions

u16 value () const
 
u16 max () const
